input_email_body:
Subject: Missing Campaign Data in HubSpot CRM due to SAP ERP Integration Problem

Campaign information vanished from HubSpot CRM as a result of an integration glitch with SAP ERP. The NAS-System was restarted and the network settings were verified.. My contact number is +39-06-8899-1122.
